title: Moon Transit in the 6th House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: When the Moon transits the 6th house for Capricorn Ascendant, emotions become tied to daily work, health, and responsibilities. You may feel mentally occupied with routines, service, and problem-solving, while moods fluctuate due to pressure or criticism. Sensitivity toward coworkers or obligations can increase. This phase supports emotional discipline through structured habits and mindful care of health. Stability improves when duties are handled calmly and feelings are not allowed to interfere with practical judgment.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Emotional focus on duties and service

sections.title: Finance
points: Spending on health or daily needs

closing: This Moon transit asks Capricorn Ascendants to manage emotions through discipline and service. Calm routines restore balance.
